name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
A video of Hu Jintao before
In the video, Li Zhanshu took the documents on Hu Jintao's desk and put them on his own desk, and communicated with the staff.
He was pulled by Wang Huning on the way.
The staff lowered their heads to communicate with Hu Jintao.
There were reporters and photographers in front of them directly aiming to shoot the scene of Hu Jintao communicating with the staff
In the distance, several representatives were whispering to each other, and most of them were standing still.

content: Killing me

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The main reason is that I am confused, because there is no need to wash away the fact that Hu left the stage. This matter is not important, it is just a small episode, and it cannot prevent the reality of Xi Jinping's re-election. Of course, if they firmly believe that Hu will lead Xi to step down and Li will take over, then this matter may be more desperate, because it is obvious that Hu has failed. They can no longer expect the Communist Party to have the ability of a "wise ruler" to come out and turn the tide. From now on, they can only rely on themselves.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Of course, this is not just what they have to face, but also a reality that all Chinese people have to face, that is, no one can stop Xi Jinping. He is 68 years old this year. If the current medical technology can allow him to live to 98 years old, then he can even give birth to a prince from now on.
Obviously, there is no force in the Communist Party that can resist him, and it has lost the so-called "error correction" ability
The next step is the time for the Chinese to lose their illusions

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
In other words, in the next few decades, if you want to fight for freedom, you must rely on yourself, take great risks, and do what Peng Zaizhou did, trying to awaken the people, hoping that the sparks of the grassroots people can set the prairie on fire.
There will no longer be any great masters to help you complete what you should have done.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: @BlackRaywu Well, there can be disagreements about the reasons for his withdrawal, but this does not affect the overall situation, so even if it is a trend, Hu's withdrawal due to illness or being arrested is actually meaningless in the context of Xi's comprehensive control of power. In other words, does the emperor still need this face?

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: 2022 is full of good news!

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
It is said that Xinjiang is recruiting recovered COVID patients to participate in the front-line key epidemic prevention work.
And they have also issued "iron man certificates" so that they do not have to participate in daily nucleic acid tests.
I think this is actually scientifically justified, but ordinary people do not think so.
Chinese people are particularly afraid of recovered COVID patients, thinking that they carry the virus. Even these recovered patients have encountered obstacles everywhere when looking for jobs.
And now the evil force has paid back, and from now on, the recovered patients you are most afraid of will be responsible for doing nucleic acid tests for you.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
In a small city in the south, the teacher sent a notice at 8 or 9 in the evening, saying that the Education Bureau notified that students need to hold a nucleic acid test certificate to attend school tomorrow. As a result, many parents carried their children around the city in the middle of the night to find a nucleic acid test site. It was crowded everywhere. The city's permanent population is about 600,000.
